thread.title: New MobileIron Resources Help Enterprises get the Most out of iOS 9

title: New MobileIron Resources Help Enterprises get the Most out of iOS 9
text: New MobileIron Resources Help Enterprises get the Most out of iOS 9   11:02:46 New MobileIron Resources Help Enterprises get the Most out of iOS... -- MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., Sept. 9,   MobileIron's Logo. MobileIron's Logo. <-  <- stripped tags -> MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif. , Sept. 9,   iOS 9 is designed to help enterprises scale mobility through the new generation of apps that were enabled through iOS 8. MobileIron (NASDAQ: [[]]) today published actionable resources to help enterprises get the most out of iOS 9. "Last year, Apple said that iOS 8 was 'the biggest release for developers since the introduction of the App Store.' iOS 9 will make this new class of iOS 8-enabled apps easier for enterprise customers to deploy and secure," said Sean Ginevan , senior director of Strategy, MobileIron. "Apple is leveraging its ecosystem to help enterprises to scale mobility through apps like never before." Join MobileIron for an overview of what iOS 9 means for the enterprise. [[]] to participate on September 22 at 10:00 A.M. PDT . MobileIron offers a range of resources to help enterprise customers get up to speed on iOS 9: [[]] : Provides in-depth analysis of the new enterprise features, as well as the opportunities and implications of key consumer features. [[]] : Outlines the top 9 things IT administrators need to know about iOS 9. [[]]: Offers practical advice for how enterprises should be thinking about the new capabilities on September 22 at 10:00 A.M. PDT . [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQnpPaTh2ZDNkM0xtMXZZbWxzWldseWIyNHVZMjl0TDJWdUwzWnBaR1Z2TDJsdmN5MDVMVzkyWlhKMmFXVjNYQ0lnY21Wc1BWd2libTltYjJ4c2IzZGNJaUIwWVhKblpYUTlYQ0pmWW14aGJtdGNJajVXYVdSbGJ6d3ZZVDQ9fA==]]: Reviews iOS 9 capabilities to help IT administrators quickly understand the implications for their businesses. About MobileIron MobileIron provides the secure foundation for companies around the world to transform into Mobile First organizations. For more information, please visit www.mobileiron.com .
